website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for families or housemates who need to share power for all of their devices. It’s got everything you need to charge up to five devices at once.
pros: It’s got four USB ports and a Qi wireless charging pad
It comes with short cables that are ideal for keeping everything tidy
cons: The silicone gel cover is great for protecting screens, but it’s also really good at collecting dust and dirt

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phones organizer and charger
customer_reviews.text: Bought this charging dock for my kids and my husband. Everyone always complains about losing their charging cables and adapters for their phones. With this charging dock i don't have to keep trying to find the lost chargers. Allow us to charge all our smartphones and tables at once. It's also has wifi charge, very convenient & organized!!! I would totally recommend this charging as it is the perfect solution for charging multiple devices.
customer_reviews.author: Kaylee

customer_reviews.title: Great to charge multiple devices
customer_reviews.text: I was tired of having to use power blocks for every device I had so I wanted a usb charging station and this is what I settled on. It has 4 USB ports and a wireless charging spot too which is useful for newer iPhones. I can now charge up to 5 devices at once. It works great and does not waste power running all the time. It doesn’t have any annoying lights either. This works great for me and my family.
customer_reviews.author: Macho Man

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this charging station!! I was so sick of having multiple chargers in every outlet around the house, yet for some reason could never find one that was working or one that wasn’t being occupied! With kids this is a must have! I have tried others, this is by far superior
customer_reviews.author: Lannonq

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: We loved this product when we first got it. We plugged it in and set it up and loved how well it charged everything. It’s been there for 4 months now, but everything we put on it will start to charge, then randomly stop charging. We’ll put our phones on it/plug them in before bed, but when we go to get them in the morning they are barely at 50%. We have a normal wall charger that we’ve had to use and it charges our phones fast and to a full charge, so I know it’s not our devices. Wish it would have lasted a lot longer than that.
customer_reviews.author: Chelsee

customer_reviews.title: Good to charge multiple things at once
customer_reviews.text: This is nice when we travel to charge all our phones at once. It charges them fast . We keep it in our suitcase so we don't forget it. Easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Taxlady

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT, I think you will love it.
customer_reviews.text: One solid month in. The best product on the market. We have 3 iPhones, 1 MacBook Pro, 1 iPad Pro, 1 iPad Mini 3, 1 Set of Apple AirPods and 1 Apple Charging Case. Finding and keeping my lightning connector for my Xs Max, it’s Charging Case and AirPods became a nightmare because other family members kept “borrowing” it. This lives on my nightstand, so no one can “borrow” it anymore and it’s always available for me without having to search my whole house for whoever borrowed my lightning connector. Also, it charged everything at the same time perfectly. Absolutely no complaints on the charging time even when everything is connected. I don’t know how I survived without it.
customer_reviews.author: Leon

customer_reviews.title: Tired of looking for charging cables and/or the clutter of them?  GET THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Much like everyone in the world, I have a dozen electronic devices that all came with charging cables but never could seem to find a darn cable when I needed it. The wife and kids were always unplugging them and taking them off somewhere. I finally got tired of looking for them and found this gem on Amazon. It is now one of the most used electronic devices used in the house. It stays in one place on the kitchen counter, and it makes life so much easier for me and the family. The wireless charging is a plus, and the ability to swap out cables for other ones (say you have all iOS devices over Android) is great!
customer_reviews.author: Kevin Peck

customer_reviews.title: Good charger, helps keep things tidy
customer_reviews.text: Got this to help clean up our living room table. Also because we upgraded some of our phones, we had a mix of ones that were wireless charge capable and ones that were not so we wanted a charger that could handle both. I like the fact that it keeps everything nice and neat, especially with the short cables. Unfortunately after just a few days one of the supplied Apple cables stopped working so I suppose they are not MFi certified. For this reason I can’t give it a 5, had they not included any cables I might feel differently.
customer_reviews.author: D. Cohen

customer_reviews.title: Charging! Charging 1,2,3
customer_reviews.text: Being able to Charge more than two wireless devices as the same time is very convenient and amazing. The charger is Light Weight which makes it easy to pack and carry on long trips etc. it’s also compatible with my universal travel adapter which is cool. I gave this asa gift to my partner and he loves it. I wish I had bought two. Not only is it durable but it also charges the devices super fast without any glitches or delay.
customer_reviews.author: Jadore Mattis

customer_reviews.title: Does not fast charge the Samsung galaxy S8
customer_reviews.text: So I will say it is extremely sturdy and very clean looking. All of my devices fit nicely and don't feel like they're going to fall. However, I'm rating this low because it does not fast charge any of my devices. I have a samsung galaxy s8 active and and a samsung galaxy tab 2, both are capable of fast charging, both give the slow charging warning when I plug them into the station or put the phone on the wireless charger. I haven't decided if I'm going to keep this yet or not bc I rarely need to fast charge my tablet, but overall it's a big let down
customer_reviews.author: Kristin Scheel

customer_reviews.title: Great for so many reasons!
customer_reviews.text: I live this charging station for so many reasons but I will only name a few first I love that it works on apple and android since everyone has their on preference in my family and we like both it also works for I pads and I love when we go on vacations we will only have to worry about taking this one station and won't have to worry about leaving them behind or having enough outlets, get one you will love it too!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle L. Snead

customer_reviews.title: Great design but cords fail...BEWARE!
customer_reviews.text: Great design, but 3 of the 4 the cords they included stopped working in just a few weeks. I cannot find how to contact the company unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Christian A. Orton

customer_reviews.title: It seems to do the job
customer_reviews.text: It works. It charges my iPad easily and quickly, same with my iPhone 6. I have yet to use the wireless charging so I’m not sure if it works. It heats up also, to a point that is kind of sketchy but I just unplug it when I’m not charging anything.
customer_reviews.author: Shlutz McGee

customer_reviews.title: Neatens up the charging area.
customer_reviews.text: This is super handy in my clutter area in the kitchen. That’s where all the family devices live, and when I didn’t think it was possible to neaten things up this product did just that. I love that it has a wireless charger on the end, I’m the only one who uses it. The iPads sit propped up even with their cases on. Charging speed is as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Beatles Lover

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed on second purchase
customer_reviews.text: I got this as a gift for my mom last year. I liked hers so I ordered it for myself. It is very sturdy. I like the construction. I have a samsung tablet and a phone. It seems as if they both do not charge faster. The wireless charger is not to good. Seems like I have to move and wiggle phone till it picks up connection. My moms works fine. Maybe I just got a dud.
customer_reviews.author: kymberlane

customer_reviews.title: Good wireless and wired.
customer_reviews.text: I works well and I like the soft dividers. 4 stars because one of the Lightning cables was defective and never worked. Wireless charger worked well with all of our iPhone devices (8 and up, we have them all)
customer_reviews.author: E. A ZANAGAR

customer_reviews.title: Many reasons to love this!
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been wanting one of these for a long time. We all use it and love it. It charges very fast which I’m very very happy about. I can charge my iPhone and my daughter can charge her Samsung at the same time. Plus there’s room to charge 3 more. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jesse K. McCartney

customer_reviews.title: Compact and functions well for family charging.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for our needs, to dock the family devices at night. Did need to buy additional charging cables because we all needed the Apple fast charging cords and this comes with a mixture of those and another type.
customer_reviews.author: K. King

customer_reviews.title: Best Charging Station
customer_reviews.text: Perfect, just perfect! Build quality was much better than the one I previously had. Dividers are thick, not flimsy, and look good. It has a decent weight for its size and doesn’t look or feel cheap. This is the one!
customer_reviews.author: N. Bell

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed that not all cords would fit my Apple products!  But I love it!
customer_reviews.text: Half my cords didn’t fit my Apple products so had to use my other cords, but I love having them all in one place. I have 2 IPads & 2 phones which I use on the recharge pad!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Wynne

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE!!!
customer_reviews.text: Got them for a single charging station and loved it so much I got more. Office desk, next to recliner, upstairs, tv room, Christmas stocking.
customer_reviews.author: Linda De.

customer_reviews.title: It works, quick recharge, easy to use, all my items in one place.
customer_reviews.text: It looks good on my desk top, cords are just long enough to attach and charge. The racks are a little tight for my kindle and tablet with the covers.
customer_reviews.author: Helena Hamilton

customer_reviews.title: Cordless portion stopped working right away
customer_reviews.text: The cordless portion of the charger stopped working shortly after I received the charger.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca

customer_reviews.title: holds a lot in a small space!
customer_reviews.text: We needed a dock to accommodate for three phones and an iPad. Ordered this because it would hold all the devices but still had a compact footprint and would fit on a small side table. So far, very happy with it - fits in the space we had and the wireless charging spot is handy.
customer_reviews.author: Martha

customer_reviews.title: So convenient and practical!
customer_reviews.text: I love that I can plug my phone,tablet etc. into the same space and not have a bunch of extra cords !
customer_reviews.author: Barbie

customer_reviews.title: Really Faster charging
customer_reviews.text: There is many options for this item (charging 4 devices wired and 1 wireless, fixed and supporting devices, ....)
customer_reviews.author: Hosam Lasker

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: Like the fact you know when things are charging. Like the short cords so not a lot laying around. Good value for the money. Have had no issues
customer_reviews.author: wendy

customer_reviews.title: Easy to organize your devives
customer_reviews.text: I was so tired of device Cords everywhere so this was easy. Fast charging and keeps my counters clutter free
customer_reviews.author: COP93

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: Our family has been needing something like this. NO more chargers gone missing!!!(:
customer_reviews.author: Stephhh

customer_reviews.title: Is it worth your money? My answer is yes :)
customer_reviews.text: This is really a good charging station to purchase. I am using this one to charge my two smartphones and one tablet. I can charge them simultaneously without any problem. I had charged my Samsung galaxy note 8 using both the USB cable and the wifi charging dock to see which one is better, and surprisingly both of them were same. It took me only 35-40 minutes to charge the phone fully.
customer_reviews.author: Kawser Zaman

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded expectations
customer_reviews.text: Would buy again and readily recommend to others. Super fast wireless charging feature. Very pleased with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry

customer_reviews.title: Attractive on counter top.
customer_reviews.text: This station relieves the mess created by too many wires.
customer_reviews.author: CB

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Liked it so much, we bought A second one for our time-share. Charges everything well
customer_reviews.author: Angie Cromar

customer_reviews.title: Great Item
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing I have 3 of them now so I would say this is a great buy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for multiple devices
customer_reviews.text: Great for charging multiple devices at the same time. Compact. Easy to setup and use.
customer_reviews.author: Carol A Carvalho

customer_reviews.title: Solid buy.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Works great. Had to purchase separate usb-c cables. Only came with lightning and micro usb.
customer_reviews.author: James Sapp

customer_reviews.title: Easy & convenient!!
customer_reviews.text: Easy & convenient! And, loved the fact that we did not have to order the separate short cords a la carte ... bonus that they were included!!!
customer_reviews.author: NANCY HOSMER

customer_reviews.title: The wireless charging pad is so CONVENIENT!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love the fast charge and tidiness of multiple devices contained so neatly and orderly in such a small space.
customer_reviews.author: MC

customer_reviews.title: Broken charger cord
customer_reviews.text: One of the IOS charger cords does not work. It was a Christmas gift for my husband. Very dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great base, bad cables
customer_reviews.text: The base is great, the cables though stopped working in about 2 months of use
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: Runs Hot
customer_reviews.text: Great little unit but it made my phone to hot.
customer_reviews.author: PlumTree

customer_reviews.title: It was  exactlly what i wanted and better.
customer_reviews.text: I loved it, it worked great for about 2 weeks and the wireless charging station stopped charging. I like everything about it, I really hated sending it back
customer_reviews.author: Ashley A.

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Fits exactly where I wanted it. Would recommend to others.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for a family. I have my wife and kids drop off at our charging station after school or during dinner and then there phone is charged!
customer_reviews.author: Ernest M.

customer_reviews.title: Must have for your guest bedroom or consolidating mobile device to a single charging location.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Sturdy unit. Placed unit in our guest bedroom and now my guest can now charge their devices without having to find an outlet. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Two thumbs up!
customer_reviews.text: Fast and easy to use. Super convenient to charge any/multiple devices at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: Ruby Knox

customer_reviews.title: It is what it says it is
customer_reviews.text: All as advertised. I wish it had 2 more Apple cords included.
customer_reviews.author: Rob in N. GA

customer_reviews.title: Essential these days
customer_reviews.text: As described, very well constructed silicone gel charging station. It comes with a built-in Smart IC USB charging ports, so I don't have to figure out if it charges at 2.1A on a iPhone or to apply a low slow charge at 1A for other devices. There is plenty of room for various devices including charging power-banks. Works perfect as described, and if the price is right, this may be for you. Recommended. I will update this review if needed to share more experiences and therefore a frame of reference. If you found these extra photos useful, please take a moment to click YES below. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: DAYS FamilyTop Contributor: Photography

customer_reviews.title: Convenient and versatile
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charging station for a beach house that we just bought. I like that it has a QI wireless charger as well as four spots for wired charging. There are two iPhone places and two androids places in addition to the wireless charging pad. I needed that versatility since I don’t know what people will need during their stay. Since we have five Apple devices, I use other cables that I have to charge the rest of ours. After using it for a couple of weeks, I have found that it charges well in each of the spots. What is even better is that it was about $10 less than another one that I was considering.
customer_reviews.author: Douglas C.

customer_reviews.title: ALL PARTS DO NOT WORK
customer_reviews.text: First item: the wireless charging station worked only 1 out of every 10 times. Ordered a replacement, returned the first non-working station. Second item: wireless station worked, but one of the the wire stations did non. We tried different wires, but its a dud. Side note - holds up phones and kindles, but not IPads
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Boyarshinov

customer_reviews.title: Good looking, non-slip surface keeps devices in place and charged
customer_reviews.text: Very effective at decluttering our kitchen countertop, which was being taken over by a pile of cables and the phones & tablets they were plugged into. I especially like the non-slip material the top of the unit is covered in, as it keeps smaller devices from falling off. The wireless charging pad is very nice to have, I just throw my iPhone X on it whenever I'm going to be in that area for a time. The coloring matches our kitchen decor, and the short cables included help in keeping clutter to a minimum.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan Foulkes

customer_reviews.title: Work great, good quality
customer_reviews.text: Wish it came with a short cable to charge Apple Watch. I thought the Wireless pad would charge the watch, but it does not. If they at least had a short cable available for the apple Watch for an extra cost, I would be pleased. Like the station, put all my devices in place at one time. it charges quickly, compact and works well with all devices....except the watch....I don't want the long watch cable hanging around!!!
customer_reviews.author: ItsBarbara

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is very well constructed with no flimsy partitions like some of the other models offered. It doesn't take up much space and works way better than I expected. The charger comes with 2 lightning wires and 2 micro USB cables. I bought from Amazon all new sets of short 7 inch lightning cables for all my iPhones and iPads which works perfectly. The Qi Charging is great for the Samsung phone.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Wireless station did not work
customer_reviews.text: I tried an iphone 6,7,8 and a Samsung galaxy 6 and 7 and the wireless station would not work. Returned and refunded with no issues, but I was bummed that this didn't work for us.
customer_reviews.author: Peg

customer_reviews.title: Slow charging station
customer_reviews.text: I like the fact that I can keep my phone and tablet together on one charging station but it takes longer to fully charge my battery than just plugging into the wall outlet. Quick charge may not be the best for full battery charge. Best over night as it charges too slow for me.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Origination
customer_reviews.text: Seems to keep everything charged n together, I like the ability to just lay my Samsung phone on the charging pad, smart charging technologie
customer_reviews.author: Carl S.

customer_reviews.title: A must if you have more than 2 items to charge frequently.
customer_reviews.text: My cellphone recharges on the flat surface. It went from 5 long cords to beautiful and neat. Really made a difference and changed a tangled, messy desktop to beautiful and neat. Very smooth, gentle surface. Easy on my gadgets.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Westcott

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: Perfect. Ordered a similar product, albeit a bit cheaper, and it never did arrive after months. Jumped on and grabbed this one with not much thought. So Glad I did because it is A++
customer_reviews.author: R. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Strong enough to hold a I pad, Samsung Tablet, my old I pod. Love the wireless charging station. Like the feel of the the rubbery stands . Protects the phones, etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: minimum. Keep devices organized.
customer_reviews.text: J M able to keep electronic devices organized while they are charging. Charges fast and keeps cords to a minimun.
customer_reviews.author: LDH

customer_reviews.title: Not a fast charger station. Ok for overnight.
customer_reviews.text: It should last. Can't say that the tablets fit if there's a case, phones either, but it operates reliably if slowly.
customer_reviews.author: Judy Montgomery

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I love having the charging station on my counter. We can charge our phones plus my kindle and my watch all together.
customer_reviews.author: Marilyn Schumert

customer_reviews.title: Great multi-charger!
customer_reviews.text: So convenient. Tidies up the area. Would love if it had 2 wireless chargers!
customer_reviews.author: Ann

product_meta.title: Faster Charging Station, Hometall 5-in-1 Multiple Phone Dock Stand with 4 USB Ports(Free 4 Cables) and 10W QI Wireless Charging Pad, Compatible for Samsung, iPhone, IPads,Other Electronics(Grey)
product_meta.description:
Features:
▶QI Wireless Charging Station: Bringing you one step closer to the future, the wireless charging station also features an amazing wireless charging pad for QI enabled devices like the LG Nexus 7, Samsung Galaxy S7, Sony XPERIA Z3V, Moto 360 Smart Watch and etc., all you have to do is to leave your QI integrated phone on the charging station, no cables needed
▶4 Smart IC USB Charging Ports: Intelligent quick charging 4 devices simultaneously, with max output 2.4A/port, allows you charge your Phones, Pads, and other USB devices at the same time
▶Premium Material: Made of Fireproof ABS&Anti-skid Silicone Gel, not like other plastic pad, the silicone pad can prevent accident skid from the station for your phones or tablets, and the bottom also comes with 4 small anti-skid pads to prevent the station falling off
▶Radiating holes: Control the station to certain temperature to avoid overheat when it is charging
▶Soft Indicator Light: Getting away from glaring indicators, and will not affect your sleep
▶Case compatibility: Enough 0.9inches space between each gap allows charging with cases on
▶Safety Charging: The charging station is compliant with FCC, CE, and ROHS. 

Specifications: 
Compatiblity: for USB-Charged Devices & QI Integrated Wireless Devices 
Material: Made of Fireproof ABS&Anti-skid Silicone Gel
Wireless charging Output: 5V 2A
Smart IC charging Output: 5V 2A, max 2.4A
Input: 110-220V
Power: 50W MAX

Package List:
1 x Wireless Charging Station
1 x English Use Manual
2 x Phones Cables
2 x Micro USB Cables

Kindly Note:
For the Wireless Charging, please make sure you phone or smart watch is wireless QI integrated, otherwise you need seperately buy a wireless receiver to use the wireless charging.
feature_bullets: ▶Multi Faster Charging Station: With 4 Smart IC USB Charging Ports&QI 10W Wireless Charging Station, you won't have to worry about different charging requirement for different devices,4 Intelligent quick charging 4 devices simultaneously, with max output 2.4A/port, allows you to charge multi devices at the same time,perfect for all Wireless Charging device, all you have to do is to leave your QI integrated phone on the charging station.

▶Premium Material & Intelligent Protection: Made of Fireproof ABS&Anti-skid Silicone Gel, unlike other plastic pad, the silicone pad can prevent accident skid from the station for your phones or tablets, and the bottom also comes with 4 small anti-skid pads to prevent the station from falling off,built-in 100% premium copper to protect against short-circuit, over-voltage, over-charge with FCC, CE, and ROHS certified. .

▶Space Saver: With 4 Little Handy Short USB Cables included(2 Apple&2 Micro USB Cables), excellent space saver, it would nicely organize and charge mutiple devices at the same time, perfect for family, office&public occasions.

▶Creative Appearance: The surface resembles hills and mountains. The valleys in between the hills are for devices charging and organizing, and a QI wireless charger is under the foot of hill. Ideal for homes, offices, shops, workplaces, libraries and etc.,Not only that it can be usded as practical charging station, but also a beautiful organizer decoration.

▶More Innovative Designs: Radiating holes to control the station to certain temperature to avoid overheat when it is charging;it will not affect your sleep; With enough 0.9inches space between each gap ,it will allow you to charge with cases on.Your electronic tablets and gadgets will charge at quick speed. Our IA chip has built in current protection. It automatically prevents overcharging and will stop once your mounted tablet and electronics are at 100% battery,etc.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars160 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
specifications.Additional Features: Wireless Charging Station, USB Charging HUB, Charging Station for Multiple Devices
